episodes.title: My Cult Leader Abused Me For Over 20 Years... Here's How I Got Out
episodes.description:
In this real life cult survival story, Will Allen shares how he was sucked into a dangerous, abuse cult for over two decades. It was only after years of secret abuse, the cult leader being the target of an FBI manhunt, and even a murder plot, that Will was finally able to break free - and tell his survival story. 

After college, Will got kicked out and was searching for a path to happiness. That's when he joined Buddhafield - what would become one of LA's most notorious cults. 

At first, Will found new faith and seemed to be on a path to enlightenment. He and the other cult followers didn't realize that they were in the clutches of a narcissist. 

Will became one of The Teacher's right hand people - a situation he created to draw Will close, then secretly abuse him for years. 

As the cult leader's manipulations were exposed, it led to an FBI investigation and manhunt that forced the cult underground. 

When things reached a crisis point with a murder plot, some followers realized they were living in a real life horror story. 

Find out how Will finally broke away - and discover his inspirational story of how he rebuilt his life from the ground up, even making the critically acclaimed documentary Holy Hell about his experiences. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Truth Be Told is a platform for people to share their real survival stories and real true crime stories. Everyday people reveal how they survived real life horror stories of unimaginable trauma and have gone on to rebuild their lives. 

Through these motivational and inspirational real life stories, we are raising awareness about trauma, including abuse, violence, experiences with cults, grief, and other life-changing experiences. Our goal as a supportive and motivational story channel is to share these important, emotional real life stories to help other survivors feel less alone - and to foster greater understanding of and compassion for others. 

We share these motivational real life stories Thursdays at 12 PM ET.

episodes.description:
Channel Disclaimer: This video includes is a cult survivor story. Please watch with care. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This genuine real life horror story of Jerry Golland - a Children of God cult survivor. This infamous cult has counted Rose McGowan, River Phoenix, and Joaquin Phoenix amongst its members. 

Recruited after being robbed and stranded in London, Jerry entered the Children of God and spent the next decades living a cult horror story. He shares the bizarre cult rituals and practices he saw, as well as the shocking beliefs Children of God held. 

While sent around the world by the cult, Jerry ended up wrongful arrested and thrown in a Moroccan prison, saw the shift to the organization becoming a "sex cult", and preached about the cult's doomsday prophecies. 

Jerry shares what ultimately saved his life and the elaborate plan that allowed him to flee the cult with his children. He now is allowing others to hear his inspirational real life story of rebuilding his life - and helping others who have survived one of the most shocking cults in the world.
